originalText.text: They cut no corners and take pride in longevity, they explained everything to the t from the beginning to the end. They explained how certain steps will provide a safe and long lasting project. They did an amazing job on my bathroom renovation, and you can tell in the little things like how even every grout line was, highly recommended Ak Design & Builders, Job was done in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of working with AK Design & Builders Inc and I have nothing but positive things to say about my experience. From start to finish, the team at AK Design & Builders Inc was professional, reliable, and dedicated to delivering high-quality results.

One of the things that impressed me most about this company was their attention to detail. They took the time to listen to my needs and preferences, and worked closely with me to ensure that every aspect of the project was completed to my satisfaction. Their expertise and experience in the construction industry was evident in every step of the process, from the initial consultation to the final walkthrough.

Throughout the project, the team at AK Design & Builders Inc was always available to answer my questions and address any concerns I had. They were prompt, courteous, and respectful of my time and property. Their workmanship was exceptional, and I was blown away by the final result.

Overall, I would highly recommend AK Design & Builders Inc to anyone looking for a reliable, professional, and experienced construction company. Their commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction is unmatched, and I look forward to working with them again on future projects. Thank you, AK Design & Builders Inc, for an outstanding job!
Amazing job for the exact amount I was looking to spend.
Couldn’t be happier with the results.

originalText.text: I hired AK to paint my living room and kitchen as a surprise to my husband while I was away.  We went from bright orange and yellow to a calm blue and white. I love it. They did an amazing job. They were very patient with me in choosing colors at the very last moment. Communicated with me throughout the entire process. Definitely recommend them.

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of working with AK Construction to renovate my apartment, and I was blown away by their exceptional workmanship, professionalism, and attention to detail.
From the initial consultation to the final walkthrough, the team consistently went above and beyond to ensure that the project was completed on time, within budget, and to my complete satisfaction. They listened carefully to my ideas and preferences, and were able to offer expert advice and guidance throughout the renovation process.
The end result was a beautifully crafted and functional space that exceeded my expectations. The construction crew was always on time, courteous, and respectful of my home and belongings. They also made sure to clean up thoroughly after each day's work, which was greatly appreciated.
I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a trustworthy, high-quality construction company for their next project. They truly set the standard for excellence in remodeling and renovation.
Thank you so much to the entire team for all your hard work and dedication. You have made a remarkable difference in my home, and I am forever grateful.
